14
15#ifndef DNS_KEYVALUES_H
16#define DNS_KEYVALUES_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/keyvalues.h */
19
20/*
21 * Flags field of the KEY RR rdata
22 */
23#define DNS_KEYFLAG_TYPEMASK 0xC000 /*%< Mask for "type" bits */
24#define DNS_KEYTYPE_AUTHCONF 0x0000 /*%< Key usable for both */
25#define DNS_KEYTYPE_CONFONLY 0x8000 /*%< Key usable for confidentiality */
26#define DNS_KEYTYPE_AUTHONLY 0x4000 /*%< Key usable for authentication */
27#define DNS_KEYTYPE_NOKEY 0xC000 /*%< No key usable for either; no key */
28#define DNS_KEYTYPE_NOAUTH DNS_KEYTYPE_CONFONLY
29#define DNS_KEYTYPE_NOCONF DNS_KEYTYPE_AUTHONLY
30
31#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED2 0x2000 /*%< reserved - must be zero */
32#define DNS_KEYFLAG_EXTENDED 0x1000 /*%< key has extended flags */
33#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED4 0x0800 /*%< reserved - must be zero */
34#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED5 0x0400 /*%< reserved - must be zero */
35#define DNS_KEYFLAG_OWNERMASK 0x0300 /*%< these bits determine the type */
36#define DNS_KEYOWNER_USER 0x0000 /*%< key is assoc. with user */
37#define DNS_KEYOWNER_ENTITY 0x0200 /*%< key is assoc. with entity eg host */
38#define DNS_KEYOWNER_ZONE 0x0100 /*%< key is zone key */
39#define DNS_KEYOWNER_RESERVED 0x0300 /*%< reserved meaning */
40#define DNS_KEYFLAG_REVOKE 0x0080 /*%< key revoked (per rfc5011) */
41#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED9 0x0040 /*%< reserved - must be zero */
42#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED10 0x0020 /*%< reserved - must be zero */
43#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED11 0x0010 /*%< reserved - must be zero */
44#define DNS_KEYFLAG_SIGNATORYMASK 0x000F /*%< key can sign RR's of same name */
45
46#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVEDMASK (DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED2 | \
47 DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED4 | \
48 DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED5 | \
49 DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED9 | \
50 DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED10 | \
51 DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVED11 )
52#define DNS_KEYFLAG_KSK 0x0001 /*%< key signing key */
53
54#define DNS_KEYFLAG_RESERVEDMASK2 0xFFFF /*%< no bits defined here */
55
56/* The Algorithm field of the KEY and SIG RR's is an integer, {1..254} */
57#define DNS_KEYALG_RSAMD5 1 /*%< RSA with MD5 */
58#define DNS_KEYALG_RSA 1 /*%< Used just for tagging */
59#define DNS_KEYALG_DH 2 /*%< Diffie Hellman KEY */
60#define DNS_KEYALG_DSA 3 /*%< DSA KEY */
61#define DNS_KEYALG_NSEC3DSA 6
62#define DNS_KEYALG_DSS DNS_ALG_DSA
63#define DNS_KEYALG_ECC 4
64#define DNS_KEYALG_RSASHA1 5
65#define DNS_KEYALG_NSEC3RSASHA1 7
66#define DNS_KEYALG_RSASHA256 8
67#define DNS_KEYALG_RSASHA512 10
68#define DNS_KEYALG_ECCGOST 12
69#define DNS_KEYALG_ECDSA256 13
70#define DNS_KEYALG_ECDSA384 14
71#define DNS_KEYALG_ED25519 15
72#define DNS_KEYALG_ED448 16
73#define DNS_KEYALG_INDIRECT 252
74#define DNS_KEYALG_PRIVATEDNS 253
75#define DNS_KEYALG_PRIVATEOID 254 /*%< Key begins with OID giving alg */
76
77/* Protocol values */
78#define DNS_KEYPROTO_RESERVED 0
79#define DNS_KEYPROTO_TLS 1
80#define DNS_KEYPROTO_EMAIL 2
81#define DNS_KEYPROTO_DNSSEC 3
82#define DNS_KEYPROTO_IPSEC 4
83#define DNS_KEYPROTO_ANY 255
84
85/* Signatures */
86#define DNS_SIG_RSAMINBITS 512 /*%< Size of a mod or exp in bits */
87#define DNS_SIG_RSAMAXBITS 2552
88 /* Total of binary mod and exp */
89#define DNS_SIG_RSAMAXBYTES ((DNS_SIG_RSAMAXBITS+7/8)*2+3)
90 /*%< Max length of text sig block */
91#define DNS_SIG_RSAMAXBASE64 (((DNS_SIG_RSAMAXBYTES+2)/3)*4)
92#define DNS_SIG_RSAMINSIZE ((DNS_SIG_RSAMINBITS+7)/8)
93#define DNS_SIG_RSAMAXSIZE ((DNS_SIG_RSAMAXBITS+7)/8)
94
95#define DNS_SIG_ECDSA256SIZE 64
96#define DNS_SIG_ECDSA384SIZE 96
97
98#define DNS_KEY_ECDSA256SIZE 64
99#define DNS_KEY_ECDSA384SIZE 96
100
101#define DNS_SIG_ED25519SIZE 64
102#define DNS_SIG_ED448SIZE 114
103
104#define DNS_KEY_ED25519SIZE 32
105#define DNS_KEY_ED448SIZE 57
106
107#endif /* DNS_KEYVALUES_H */
108
